H0.text: Which family's name appears in the title of the last two books of the Catholic edition. Maccabees

H1.text: Which family's name appears in the title of the last two books of the Catholic edition. Hasmoneans

H2.text: Which family's name appears in the title of the last two books of the Catholic edition. Sadducees

H3.text: Which family's name appears in the title of the last two books of the Catholic edition. Maqabim

A4.text: The Books of the Maccabees refer to canonical books of the Bible, including 1 Maccabees and 2 Maccabees.

A5.text: The first two books are considered canonical by the Catholic Church.
